channel.title: Tank Destroyer on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Tank Destroyer on Home

item.title: Tier I Tank Destroyers
item.description: All the graphs are based on battles played during update 6.0 only (not cumulative data). The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows Tank Destroyers by Relative WR. That is the average of players’ WR in a tank compared to their average WR at the tier (in all same tier tanks).

item.title: Tier I Tank Destroyers
item.description: All the graphs are based on battles played during update 6.1 only (not cumulative data). The Best Performing Tanks Relative WR The graph shows Tank Destroyers by Relative WR. That is the average of players’ WR in a tank compared to their average WR at the tier (in all same tier tanks).
